docs.lead_paragraph: Surgeon General Regina Benjamin left her job on Tuesday and said she would return to work at the clinic she founded in Bayou La Batre, Ala.
docs.abstract: Surgeon General Regina Benjamin leaves her job and says she will return to work at clinic she founded in Bayou La Batre, Ala; Dr Benjamin gave no reason for her departure when she announced she was stepping down, fueling speculation that she may run for Congress.
docs.snippet: Surgeon General Regina Benjamin left her job on Tuesday and said she would return to work at the clinic she founded in Bayou La Batre, Ala.

docs.lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization has named as essential three medicines developed by a group that has its sights on neglected diseases.

headline.main: W.H.O. Recognition Is Boost for New Drugs
headline.print_headline: W.H.O. Recognition Is Boost for New Drugs

docs.abstract: Medicines for malaria, Chagas and sleeping sickness are named essential drugs by World Health Organization, scoring victory for 10-year-old program to develop drugs for 'neglected' diseases.
docs.snippet: The World Health Organization has named as essential three medicines developed by a group that has its sights on neglected diseases.
